descriptionHTML:
Watch face with steps counter, AM/PM and battery level dials. Working fine on all screen types (round/square) newest and oldest models: moto360 2gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3, LG G W100, LG R W110, Asus Zen Watch and others.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
Warning: watch face ONLY FOR ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.
comments: I see peps going on about it draining your battery on your watch. I installed it to my G watch via the android wear app a over 90mins ago, with batt saver switched on even after numerous facebook twitter email & texts alerts received its used 1% off battery life!!! On top of that it looks cool üòä
Looks nice but drained my smartwatch 3 battery in less than an hour.  This renders it useless for day to day use.
Bad app I cant open it very bad
Would like option to not display the bezel, since my Tag has one on the outside
Amazing but can't open it, so no comments until I use it
It would have been great if there was a weather widget.
